entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.

text: @mjrowland68 @BreakfastNews 2 good things: The response to the NZ volcano, which could be explained as a distraction from the bushfires; The response to COVID-19 which I think was largely driven by the Premiers and the better or non-suicidal half of the Paliamentary Coalition or both.
